data.title: Utopian Literature in English: An Annotated Bibliography From 1516 to the Present
data.text:
1995 Brewer, Gene [R.] (b. 1937). K-PAX. New York: St. Martin’s Press. DLC, MoS

Anarchist eutopia. Sequels are On a Beam of Light. New York: St. Martin’s Press, 2001 and K-PAX III: The Worlds of Prot. London: Bloomsbury, 2002. A 2001 film was made directed by Iain Softly (b. 1956) with a screenplay by Brewer and Charles Leavitt.
